author: Special Correspondent
text:
Signature campaign

The Periyar University in its move to put an end to ragging menace conducted signature campaign among the student representatives of the affiliated colleges.

The university conducted anti-ragging awareness programme on the varsity premises recently. The student representatives of 95 affiliated colleges in Salem, Dharmapuri, Namakkal and Krishnagiri districts participated in the awareness programme.
title: Anti-ragging awareness programme held
